meanings.definition: A scientist who studies the upper atmosphere of the Earth and other planets.
meanings.sent1: The aeronomers observed the changes in the Earth's upper atmosphere.
meanings.sent2: Many aeronomers dedicate their careers to studying planetary atmospheres.
meanings.sent3: The aeronomers had a picnic in the upper atmosphere - it was quite a view!
meanings.sent4: Like aeronomers exploring new worlds, the children ventured into the attic.
meanings.sent5: The aeronomers' passion for the skies was as vast as the universe itself.

meanings.definition: The study of the upper atmosphere of the Earth and other planets.
meanings.sent1: Aeronomers involves analyzing the composition of planetary atmospheres.
meanings.sent2: Learning about aeronomers helps us understand our place in the solar system.
meanings.sent3: During the aeronomers class, students simulated atmospheric experiments.
meanings.sent4: The mysteries of aeronomers are as intriguing as the depths of the ocean.
meanings.sent5: The textbook on aeronomers was filled with colorful illustrations of celestial bodies.
